summary:
Do you miss the old Vampire powers of Morrowind??
Do you wish being a vampire was worth it? yes?
Then get Morrowind Vampires, Vampires get back all their old abilites getting a nice BUFF
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes vampires better by giving them back all their traditional abilites from Morrowind.
It keeps their weak skyrim abilities so they get a good good buff, and are actually enjoyable.

SHORT Descripton
THIS MOD will buff your vampire with traditional Morrowind vampire powers, while still  keeping skyrims (lame) vampire bonuses.

I will be realeasing  version for Each of the old bloodlines, and you may choose which one suits your vampire.  I tried to mirror Morrowind abilities very closely.

Aundae (released)
Berne
Quarra

CHANGES

Resist Damage 15   ( there is no longer a resist Normal weapons, so i replaced with a weaker resist damage. Feedback plz)

Fortify Sneak   30

Fortify Unarmed DMG 25   

Fortify Destruction 30

Aundae Abilities
Fortify Magicka 40   (replaced fort Willpower)
Fortify Destruction 20 
fortify one handed 20    (there is no longer a short blades skill)
fortify illusion 10     (might remove, seeing as I left the natural skyrim vampire illusion buffs)
fortify alteration 10    (since there is no longer mysticism)



SORRY Accidentally Deleted old file    =[[[
 so reuploded with new description, will be releasing Berne and Quarra Versions soon, feedback appreciated thanks.  =[
author: RBFloat05
